channel.title: 2 Server Questions that need an answer
channel.description:
Okay i recently acquired a server from a friend
I was wondering how i could host this online
and Also how to get rid of his ::pickup block b/c i cant pickup anything even though i am the owner/coder

item.title: 2 Server Questions that need an answer
item.dc:creator: @bender4 bender4
item.description:
@bender4 wrote:

  1. For port forwarding go to http://portforward.com/ and find your router, pick a random game, follow the directions.

  2. This question is in wrong place it needs to be in server questions not client.

Read full topic
item.source: 2 Server Questions that need an answer

Im having trouble using portforward to open that port could somebody post a simple guide here

item.title: 2 Server Questions that need an answer
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Baker Mod Baker
item.description:
@Mod_Baker wrote:

To host online get no-ip.

and make sure your rights are right. in the first line it will say something like
playersRights > 1
make sure you meet those requirements

Read full topic
